knimeNode.name: Download / Upload from List
knimeNode.shortDescription: Copy files contained in a list from one (remote) location to another.

fullDescription.intro: This node copies files contained in the input table from one location to another. The location may be a remote location.
fullDescription.option: Column of the input table with the URIs to the files that should be copied.
Column of the input table with the URIs to where the files should be copied.

How to handle already existing files.
Overwrite
Overwrite the existing file.
Overwrite if newer
Overwrite the existing file only, if the file to copy is newer.
Abort
Abort the execution of the node.

If this is checked the node will abort if one of the files could not be transferred. If it is unchecked the output table will contain a column that indicates if the file could be successfully transferred or not.

ports.inPort: Port object containing the connection information to the server. (Optional)
Table containing the list of files that should be copied and where they should be copied to.
ports.outPort: Table containing the list of files that have been transferred and if they have been transferred or were already up to date. If files are allowed to fail there is an additional column, that will indicate if the transfer was successful or did fail.
